description:
Visual Merchandising & Window Dressing training course has been specifically created to give you the knowledge to become a Visual Merchandising expert, transform your existing shop and enable you to upskill your retail sales team using current Visual Merchandising techniques which I have gained after 20 years industry experience in London.

Perfect for Retailers or Students. I show you highly practical solutions for Visual Merchandising in todayâ€™s retail industry.

There are over 40 videos covering the following subjects;

  • Visual Merchandising techniques
  • How to create an effective store window displays
  • Mannequin handling and dressing
  • The importance of great link selling
  • How to create effective store layouts which will help to encourage the customers flow around the store
title: Visual Merchandising Course For Retailers and Students
